name: Psalm 119:117
text: Hold me up, and I will be safe, and will have respect for your statutes continually.

name: Psalm 119:118
text: You reject all those who stray from your statutes, for their deceit is in vain.

name: Psalm 119:119
text: You put away all the wicked of the earth like dross. Therefore I love your testimonies.

name: Psalm 119:120
text: My flesh trembles for fear of you. I am afraid of your judgments. AYIN

name: Psalm 119:121
text: I have done what is just and righteous. Don"t leave me to my oppressors.

name: Psalm 119:122
text: Ensure your servant"s well-being. Don"t let the proud oppress me.

name: Psalm 119:123
text: My eyes fail looking for your salvation, for your righteous word.

name: Psalm 119:124
text: Deal with your servant according to your loving kindness. Teach me your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:125
text: I am your servant. Give me understanding, that I may know your testimonies.

name: Psalm 119:126
text: It is time to act, Yahweh, for they break your law.

name: Psalm 119:127
text: Therefore I love your commandments more than gold, yes, more than pure gold.

name: Psalm 119:128
text: Therefore I consider all of your precepts to be right. I hate every false way. PEY

name: Psalm 119:129
text: Your testimonies are wonderful, therefore my soul keeps them.

name: Psalm 119:130
text: The entrance of your words gives light. It gives understanding to the simple.

name: Psalm 119:131
text: I opened my mouth wide and panted, for I longed for your commandments.

name: Psalm 119:132
text: Turn to me, and have mercy on me, as you always do to those who love your name.

name: Psalm 119:133
text: Establish my footsteps in your word. Don"t let any iniquity have dominion over me.

name: Psalm 119:134
text: Redeem me from the oppression of man, so I will observe your precepts.

name: Psalm 119:135
text: Make your face shine on your servant. Teach me your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:136
text: Streams of tears run down my eyes, because they don"t observe your law. TZADI

name: Psalm 119:137
text: You are righteous, Yahweh. Your judgments are upright.

name: Psalm 119:138
text: You have commanded your statutes in righteousness. They are fully trustworthy.

name: Psalm 119:139
text: My zeal wears me out, because my enemies ignore your words.

name: Psalm 119:140
text: Your promises have been thoroughly tested, and your servant loves them.

name: Psalm 119:141
text: I am small and despised. I don"t forget your precepts.

name: Psalm 119:142
text: Your righteousness is an everlasting righteousness. Your law is truth.

name: Psalm 119:143
text: Trouble and anguish have taken hold of me. Your commandments are my delight.

name: Psalm 119:144
text: Your testimonies are righteous forever. Give me understanding, that I may live. KUF

name: Psalm 119:145
text: I have called with my whole heart. Answer me, Yahweh! I will keep your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:146
text: I have called to you. Save me! I will obey your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:147
text: I rise before dawn and cry for help. I put my hope in your words.

name: Psalm 119:148
text: My eyes stay open through the night watches, that I might meditate on your word.

name: Psalm 119:149
text: Hear my voice according to your loving kindness. Revive me, Yahweh, according to your ordinances.

name: Psalm 119:150
text: They draw near who follow after wickedness. They are far from your law.

name: Psalm 119:151
text: You are near, Yahweh. All your commandments are truth.

name: Psalm 119:152
text: Of old I have known from your testimonies, that you have founded them forever. RESH

name: Psalm 119:153
text: Consider my affliction, and deliver me, for I don"t forget your law.

name: Psalm 119:154
text: Plead my cause, and redeem me! Revive me according to your promise.

name: Psalm 119:155
text: Salvation is far from the wicked, for they don"t seek your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:156
text: Great are your tender mercies, Yahweh. Revive me according to your ordinances.

name: Psalm 119:157
text: Many are my persecutors and my adversaries. I haven"t swerved from your testimonies.

name: Psalm 119:158
text: I look at the faithless with loathing, because they don"t observe your word.

name: Psalm 119:159
text: Consider how I love your precepts. Revive me, Yahweh, according to your loving kindness.

name: Psalm 119:160
text: All of your words are truth. Every one of your righteous ordinances endures forever. SIN AND SHIN

name: Psalm 119:161
text: Princes have persecuted me without a cause, but my heart stands in awe of your words.

name: Psalm 119:162
text: I rejoice at your word, as one who finds great spoil.

name: Psalm 119:163
text: I hate and abhor falsehood. I love your law.

name: Psalm 119:164
text: Seven times a day, I praise you, because of your righteous ordinances.

name: Psalm 119:165
text: Those who love your law have great peace. Nothing causes them to stumble.

name: Psalm 119:166
text: I have hoped for your salvation, Yahweh. I have done your commandments.

name: Psalm 119:167
text: My soul has observed your testimonies. I love them exceedingly.

name: Psalm 119:168
text: I have obeyed your precepts and your testimonies, for all my ways are before you. TAV

name: Psalm 119:169
text: Let my cry come before you, Yahweh. Give me understanding according to your word.

name: Psalm 119:170
text: Let my supplication come before you. Deliver me according to your word.

name: Psalm 119:171
text: Let my lips utter praise, for you teach me your statutes.

name: Psalm 119:172
text: Let my tongue sing of your word, for all your commandments are righteousness.

name: Psalm 119:173
text: Let your hand be ready to help me, for I have chosen your precepts.

name: Psalm 119:174
text: I have longed for your salvation, Yahweh. Your law is my delight.

name: Psalm 119:175
text: Let my soul live, that I may praise you. Let your ordinances help me.

name: Psalm 119:176
text: I have gone astray like a lost sheep. Seek your servant, for I don"t forget your commandments.

name: Psalm 120:1
text: A Song of Ascents. In my distress, I cried to Yahweh. He answered me.

name: Psalm 120:2
text: Deliver my soul, Yahweh, from lying lips, from a deceitful tongue.

name: Psalm 120:3
text: What will be given to you, and what will be done more to you, you deceitful tongue?

name: Psalm 120:4
text: Sharp arrows of the mighty, with coals of juniper.

name: Psalm 120:5
text: Woe is me, that I live in Meshech, that I dwell among the tents of Kedar!

name: Psalm 120:6
text: My soul has had her dwelling too long with him who hates peace.

name: Psalm 120:7
text: I am for peace, but when I speak, they are for war.

name: Psalm 121:1
text: A Song of Ascents. I will lift up my eyes to the hills. Where does my help come from?

name: Psalm 121:2
text: My help comes from Yahweh, who made heaven and earth.

name: Psalm 121:3
text: He will not allow your foot to be moved. He who keeps you will not slumber.

name: Psalm 121:4
text: Behold, he who keeps Israel will neither slumber nor sleep.

name: Psalm 121:5
text: Yahweh is your keeper. Yahweh is your shade on your right hand.

name: Psalm 121:6
text: The sun will not harm you by day, nor the moon by night.

name: Psalm 121:7
text: Yahweh will keep you from all evil. He will keep your soul.

name: Psalm 121:8
text: Yahweh will keep your going out and your coming in, from this time forth, and forevermore.

name: Psalm 122:1
text: A Song of Ascents. By David. I was glad when they said to me, "Let"s go to Yahweh"s house!"

name: Psalm 122:2
text: Our feet are standing within your gates, Jerusalem;

name: Psalm 122:3
text: Jerusalem, that is built as a city that is compact together;

name: Psalm 122:4
text: where the tribes go up, even Yah"s tribes, according to an ordinance for Israel, to give thanks to the name of Yahweh.

name: Psalm 122:5
text: For there are set thrones for judgment, the thrones of David"s house.

name: Psalm 122:6
text: Pray for the peace of Jerusalem. Those who love you will prosper.

name: Psalm 122:7
text: Peace be within your walls, and prosperity within your palaces.

name: Psalm 122:8
text: For my brothers" and companions" sakes, I will now say, "Peace be within you."

name: Psalm 122:9
text: For the sake of the house of Yahweh our God, I will seek your good.

name: Psalm 123:1
text: A Song of Ascents. To you I do lift up my eyes, you who sit in the heavens.

name: Psalm 123:2
text: Behold, as the eyes of servants look to the hand of their master, as the eyes of a maid to the hand of her mistress; so our eyes look to Yahweh, our God, until he has mercy on us.

name: Psalm 123:3
text: Have mercy on us, Yahweh, have mercy on us, for we have endured much contempt.

name: Psalm 123:4
text: Our soul is exceedingly filled with the scoffing of those who are at ease, with the contempt of the proud.

name: Psalm 124:1
text: A Song of Ascents. By David. If it had not been Yahweh who was on our side, let Israel now say,

name: Psalm 124:2
text: if it had not been Yahweh who was on our side, when men rose up against us;

name: Psalm 124:3
text: then they would have swallowed us up alive, when their wrath was kindled against us;

name: Psalm 124:4
text: then the waters would have overwhelmed us, the stream would have gone over our soul;

name: Psalm 124:5
text: then the proud waters would have gone over our soul.

name: Psalm 124:6
text: Blessed be Yahweh, who has not given us as a prey to their teeth.

name: Psalm 124:7
text: Our soul has escaped like a bird out of the fowler"s snare. The snare is broken, and we have escaped.

name: Psalm 124:8
text: Our help is in the name of Yahweh, who made heaven and earth.

name: Psalm 125:1
text: A Song of Ascents. Those who trust in Yahweh are as Mount Zion, which can"t be moved, but remains forever.

name: Psalm 125:2
text: As the mountains surround Jerusalem, so Yahweh surrounds his people from this time forth and forevermore.

name: Psalm 125:3
text: For the scepter of wickedness won"t remain over the allotment of the righteous; so that the righteous won"t use their hands to do evil.

name: Psalm 125:4
text: Do good, Yahweh, to those who are good, to those who are upright in their hearts.

name: Psalm 125:5
text: But as for those who turn aside to their crooked ways, Yahweh will lead them away with the workers of iniquity. Peace be on Israel.

name: Psalm 126:1
text: A Song of Ascents. When Yahweh brought back those who returned to Zion, we were like those who dream.

name: Psalm 126:2
text: Then our mouth was filled with laughter, and our tongue with singing. Then they said among the nations, "Yahweh has done great things for them."

name: Psalm 126:3
text: Yahweh has done great things for us, and we are glad.

name: Psalm 126:4
text: Restore our fortunes again, Yahweh, like the streams in the Negev.

name: Psalm 126:5
text: Those who sow in tears will reap in joy.

name: Psalm 126:6
text: He who goes out weeping, carrying seed for sowing, will certainly come again with joy, carrying his sheaves.

name: Psalm 127:1
text: A Song of Ascents. By Solomon. Unless Yahweh builds the house, they labor in vain who build it. Unless Yahweh watches over the city, the watchman guards it in vain.

name: Psalm 127:2
text: It is vain for you to rise up early, to stay up late, eating the bread of toil; for he gives sleep to his loved ones.

name: Psalm 127:3
text: Behold, children are a heritage of Yahweh. The fruit of the womb is his reward.

name: Psalm 127:4
text: As arrows in the hand of a mighty man, so are the children of youth.

name: Psalm 127:5
text: Happy is the man who has his quiver full of them. They won"t be disappointed when they speak with their enemies in the gate.

name: Psalm 128:1
text: A Song of Ascents. Blessed is everyone who fears Yahweh, who walks in his ways.

name: Psalm 128:2
text: For you will eat the labor of your hands. You will be happy, and it will be well with you.

name: Psalm 128:3
text: Your wife will be as a fruitful vine, in the innermost parts of your house; your children like olive plants, around your table.

name: Psalm 128:4
text: Behold, thus is the man blessed who fears Yahweh.

name: Psalm 128:5
text: May Yahweh bless you out of Zion, and may you see the good of Jerusalem all the days of your life.

name: Psalm 128:6
text: Yes, may you see your children"s children. Peace be upon Israel.

name: Psalm 129:1
text: A Song of Ascents. Many times they have afflicted me from my youth up. Let Israel now say,

name: Psalm 129:2
text: many times they have afflicted me from my youth up, yet they have not prevailed against me.

name: Psalm 129:3
text: The plowers plowed on my back. They made their furrows long.

name: Psalm 129:4
text: Yahweh is righteous. He has cut apart the cords of the wicked.

name: Psalm 129:5
text: Let them be disappointed and turned backward, all those who hate Zion.

name: Psalm 129:6
text: Let them be as the grass on the housetops, which withers before it grows up;

name: Psalm 129:7
text: with which the reaper doesn"t fill his hand, nor he who binds sheaves, his bosom.

name: Psalm 129:8
text: Neither do those who go by say, "The blessing of Yahweh be on you. We bless you in the name of Yahweh."

name: Psalm 130:1
text: A Song of Ascents. Out of the depths I have cried to you, Yahweh.

name: Psalm 130:2
text: Lord, hear my voice. Let your ears be attentive to the voice of my petitions.

name: Psalm 130:3
text: If you, Yah, kept a record of sins, Lord, who could stand?

name: Psalm 130:4
text: But there is forgiveness with you, therefore you are feared.

name: Psalm 130:5
text: I wait for Yahweh. My soul waits. I hope in his word.

name: Psalm 130:6
text: My soul longs for the Lord more than watchmen long for the morning; more than watchmen for the morning.

name: Psalm 130:7
text: Israel, hope in Yahweh, for with Yahweh there is loving kindness. With him is abundant redemption.

name: Psalm 130:8
text: He will redeem Israel from all their sins.

name: Psalm 131:1
text: A Song of Ascents. By David. Yahweh, my heart isn"t haughty, nor my eyes lofty; nor do I concern myself with great matters, or things too wonderful for me.

name: Psalm 131:2
text: Surely I have stilled and quieted my soul, like a weaned child with his mother, like a weaned child is my soul within me.

name: Psalm 131:3
text: Israel, hope in Yahweh, from this time forth and forevermore.

name: Psalm 132:1
text: A Song of Ascents. Yahweh, remember David and all his affliction,

name: Psalm 132:2
text: how he swore to Yahweh, and vowed to the Mighty One of Jacob:

name: Psalm 132:3
text: "Surely I will not come into the structure of my house, nor go up into my bed;

name: Psalm 132:4
text: I will not give sleep to my eyes, or slumber to my eyelids;

name: Psalm 132:5
text: until I find out a place for Yahweh, a dwelling for the Mighty One of Jacob."

name: Psalm 132:6
text: Behold, we heard of it in Ephrathah. We found it in the field of Jaar:

name: Psalm 132:7
text: "We will go into his dwelling place. We will worship at his footstool.

name: Psalm 132:8
text: Arise, Yahweh, into your resting place; you, and the ark of your strength.

name: Psalm 132:9
text: Let your priest be clothed with righteousness. Let your saints shout for joy!"

name: Psalm 132:10
text: For your servant David"s sake, don"t turn away the face of your anointed one.

name: Psalm 132:11
text: Yahweh has sworn to David in truth. He will not turn from it: "I will set the fruit of your body on your throne.

name: Psalm 132:12
text: If your children will keep my covenant, my testimony that I will teach them, their children also will sit on your throne forevermore."

name: Psalm 132:13
text: For Yahweh has chosen Zion. He has desired it for his habitation.

name: Psalm 132:14
text: "This is my resting place forever. Here I will live, for I have desired it.

name: Psalm 132:15
text: I will abundantly bless her provision. I will satisfy her poor with bread.

name: Psalm 132:16
text: Her priests I will also clothe with salvation. Her saints will shout aloud for joy.

name: Psalm 132:17
text: There I will make the horn of David to bud. I have ordained a lamp for my anointed.

name: Psalm 132:18
text: I will clothe his enemies with shame, but on himself, his crown will be resplendent."

name: Psalm 133:1
text: A Song of Ascents. By David. See how good and how pleasant it is for brothers to live together in unity!

name: Psalm 133:2
text: It is like the precious oil on the head, that ran down on the beard, even Aaron"s beard; that came down on the edge of his robes;

name: Psalm 133:3
text: like the dew of Hermon, that comes down on the hills of Zion: for there Yahweh gives the blessing, even life forevermore.

name: Psalm 134:1
text: A Song of Ascents. Look! Praise Yahweh, all you servants of Yahweh, who stand by night in Yahweh"s house!

name: Psalm 134:2
text: Lift up your hands in the sanctuary. Praise Yahweh!

name: Psalm 134:3
text: May Yahweh bless you from Zion; even he who made heaven and earth.

name: Psalm 135:1
text: Praise Yah! Praise the name of Yahweh! Praise him, you servants of Yahweh,

name: Psalm 135:2
text: you who stand in the house of Yahweh, in the courts of our God"s house.

name: Psalm 135:3
text: Praise Yah, for Yahweh is good. Sing praises to his name, for that is pleasant.

name: Psalm 135:4
text: For Yah has chosen Jacob for himself; Israel for his own possession.

name: Psalm 135:5
text: For I know that Yahweh is great, that our Lord is above all gods.

name: Psalm 135:6
text: Whatever Yahweh pleased, that he has done, in heaven and in earth, in the seas and in all deeps;

name: Psalm 135:7
text: who causes the clouds to rise from the ends of the earth; who makes lightnings with the rain; who brings forth the wind out of his treasuries;

name: Psalm 135:8
text: Who struck the firstborn of Egypt, both of man and animal;

name: Psalm 135:9
text: Who sent signs and wonders into the midst of you, Egypt, on Pharaoh, and on all his servants;

name: Psalm 135:10
text: who struck many nations, and killed mighty kings,

name: Psalm 135:11
text: Sihon king of the Amorites, Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan,

name: Psalm 135:12
text: and gave their land for a heritage, a heritage to Israel, his people.

name: Psalm 135:13
text: Your name, Yahweh, endures forever; your renown, Yahweh, throughout all generations.

name: Psalm 135:14
text: For Yahweh will judge his people, and have compassion on his servants.

name: Psalm 135:15
text: The idols of the nations are silver and gold, the work of men"s hands.

name: Psalm 135:16
text: They have mouths, but they can"t speak. They have eyes, but they can"t see.

name: Psalm 135:17
text: They have ears, but they can"t hear; neither is there any breath in their mouths.

name: Psalm 135:18
text: Those who make them will be like them; yes, everyone who trusts in them.

name: Psalm 135:19
text: House of Israel, praise Yahweh! House of Aaron, praise Yahweh!

name: Psalm 135:20
text: House of Levi, praise Yahweh! You who fear Yahweh, praise Yahweh!

name: Psalm 135:21
text: Blessed be Yahweh from Zion, Who dwells at Jerusalem. Praise Yah!

name: Psalm 136:1
text: Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good; for his loving kindness endures forever.

name: Psalm 136:2
text: Give thanks to the God of gods; for his loving kindness endures forever.

name: Psalm 136:3
text: Give thanks to the Lord of lords; for his loving kindness endures forever:

name: Psalm 136:4
text: To him who alone does great wonders; for his loving kindness endures forever:

name: Psalm 136:5
text: To him who by understanding made the heavens; for his loving kindness endures forever:

name: Psalm 136:6
text: To him who spread out the earth above the waters; for his loving kindness endures forever:

name: Psalm 136:7
text: To him who made the great lights; for his loving kindness endures forever:

name: Psalm 136:8
text: The sun to rule by day; for his loving kindness endures forever;

name: Psalm 136:9
text: The moon and stars to rule by night; for his loving kindness endures forever:

name: Psalm 136:10
text: To him who struck down the Egyptian firstborn; for his loving kindness endures forever;

name: Psalm 136:11
text: And brought out Israel from among them; for his loving kindness endures forever;

name: Psalm 136:12
text: With a strong hand, and with an outstretched arm; for his loving kindness endures forever:

name: Psalm 136:13
text: To him who divided the Red Sea apart; for his loving kindness endures forever;

name: Psalm 136:14
text: And made Israel to pass through its midst; for his loving kindness endures forever;

name: Psalm 136:15
text: But overthrew Pharaoh and his army in the Red Sea; for his loving kindness endures forever:

name: Psalm 136:16
text: To him who led his people through the wilderness; for his loving kindness endures forever:

name: Psalm 136:17
text: To him who struck great kings; for his loving kindness endures forever;

name: Psalm 136:18
text: And killed mighty kings; for his loving kindness endures forever:

name: Psalm 136:19
text: Sihon king of the Amorites; for his loving kindness endures forever;

name: Psalm 136:20
text: Og king of Bashan; for his loving kindness endures forever;

name: Psalm 136:21
text: And gave their land as an inheritance; for his loving kindness endures forever;

name: Psalm 136:22
text: Even a heritage to Israel his servant; for his loving kindness endures forever:

name: Psalm 136:23
text: Who remembered us in our low estate; for his loving kindness endures forever;

name: Psalm 136:24
text: And has delivered us from our adversaries; for his loving kindness endures forever:

name: Psalm 136:25
text: Who gives food to every creature; for his loving kindness endures forever.

name: Psalm 136:26
text: Oh give thanks to the God of heaven; for his loving kindness endures forever.

name: Psalm 137:1
text: By the rivers of Babylon, there we sat down. Yes, we wept, when we remembered Zion.

name: Psalm 137:2
text: On the willows in its midst, we hung up our harps.

name: Psalm 137:3
text: For there, those who led us captive asked us for songs. Those who tormented us demanded songs of joy: "Sing us one of the songs of Zion!"

name: Psalm 137:4
text: How can we sing Yahweh"s song in a foreign land?

name: Psalm 137:5
text: If I forget you, Jerusalem, let my right hand forget its skill.

name: Psalm 137:6
text: Let my tongue stick to the roof of my mouth if I don"t remember you; if I don"t prefer Jerusalem above my chief joy.

name: Psalm 137:7
text: Remember, Yahweh, against the children of Edom, the day of Jerusalem; who said, "Raze it! Raze it even to its foundation!"

name: Psalm 137:8
text: Daughter of Babylon, doomed to destruction, he will be happy who rewards you, as you have served us.

name: Psalm 137:9
text: Happy shall he be, who takes and dashes your little ones against the rock.

name: Psalm 138:1
text: By David. I will give you thanks with my whole heart. Before the gods, I will sing praises to you.

name: Psalm 138:2
text: I will bow down toward your holy temple, and give thanks to your Name for your loving kindness and for your truth; for you have exalted your Name and your Word above all.

name: Psalm 138:3
text: In the day that I called, you answered me. You encouraged me with strength in my soul.

name: Psalm 138:4
text: All the kings of the earth will give you thanks, Yahweh, for they have heard the words of your mouth.

name: Psalm 138:5
text: Yes, they will sing of the ways of Yahweh; for great is Yahweh"s glory.

name: Psalm 138:6
text: For though Yahweh is high, yet he looks after the lowly; but the proud, he knows from afar.

name: Psalm 138:7
text: Though I walk in the midst of trouble, you will revive me. You will stretch forth your hand against the wrath of my enemies. Your right hand will save me.

name: Psalm 138:8
text: Yahweh will fulfill that which concerns me; your loving kindness, Yahweh, endures forever. Don"t forsake the works of your own hands.

name: Psalm 139:1
text: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm by David. Yahweh, you have searched me, and you know me.

name: Psalm 139:2
text: You know my sitting down and my rising up. You perceive my thoughts from afar.

name: Psalm 139:3
text: You search out my path and my lying down, and are acquainted with all my ways.

name: Psalm 139:4
text: For there is not a word on my tongue, but, behold, Yahweh, you know it altogether.

name: Psalm 139:5
text: You hem me in behind and before. You laid your hand on me.

name: Psalm 139:6
text: This knowledge is beyond me. It"s lofty. I can"t attain it.

name: Psalm 139:7
text: Where could I go from your Spirit? Or where could I flee from your presence?

name: Psalm 139:8
text: If I ascend up into heaven, you are there. If I make my bed in Sheol, behold, you are there!

name: Psalm 139:9
text: If I take the wings of the dawn, and settle in the uttermost parts of the sea;

name: Psalm 139:10
text: Even there your hand will lead me, and your right hand will hold me.

name: Psalm 139:11
text: If I say, "Surely the darkness will overwhelm me; the light around me will be night;"

name: Psalm 139:12
text: even the darkness doesn"t hide from you, but the night shines as the day. The darkness is like light to you.

name: Psalm 139:13
text: For you formed my inmost being. You knit me together in my mother"s womb.

name: Psalm 139:14
text: I will give thanks to you, for I am fearfully and wonderfully made. Your works are wonderful. My soul knows that very well.

name: Psalm 139:15
text: My frame wasn"t hidden from you, when I was made in secret, woven together in the depths of the earth.

name: Psalm 139:16
text: Your eyes saw my body. In your book they were all written, the days that were ordained for me, when as yet there were none of them.

name: Psalm 139:17
text: How precious to me are your thoughts, God! How vast is their sum!

name: Psalm 139:18
text: If I would count them, they are more in number than the sand. When I wake up, I am still with you.

name: Psalm 139:19
text: If only you, God, would kill the wicked. Get away from me, you bloodthirsty men!

name: Psalm 139:20
text: For they speak against you wickedly. Your enemies take your name in vain.

name: Psalm 139:21
text: Yahweh, don"t I hate those who hate you? Am I not grieved with those who rise up against you?

name: Psalm 139:22
text: I hate them with perfect hatred. They have become my enemies.

name: Psalm 139:23
text: Search me, God, and know my heart. Try me, and know my thoughts.

name: Psalm 139:24
text: See if there is any wicked way in me, and lead me in the everlasting way.

name: Psalm 140:1
text: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm by David. Deliver me, Yahweh, from the evil man. Preserve me from the violent man;

name: Psalm 140:2
text: those who devise mischief in their hearts. They continually gather themselves together for war.

name: Psalm 140:3
text: They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent. Viper"s poison is under their lips. Selah.

name: Psalm 140:4
text: Yahweh, keep me from the hands of the wicked. Preserve me from the violent men who have determined to trip my feet.

name: Psalm 140:5
text: The proud have hidden a snare for me, they have spread the cords of a net by the path. They have set traps for me. Selah.

name: Psalm 140:6
text: I said to Yahweh, "You are my God." Listen to the cry of my petitions, Yahweh.

name: Psalm 140:7
text: Yahweh, the Lord, the strength of my salvation, you have covered my head in the day of battle.

name: Psalm 140:8
text: Yahweh, don"t grant the desires of the wicked. Don"t let their evil plans succeed, or they will become proud. Selah.

name: Psalm 140:9
text: As for the head of those who surround me, let the mischief of their own lips cover them.

name: Psalm 140:10
text: Let burning coals fall on them. Let them be thrown into the fire, into miry pits, from where they never rise.

name: Psalm 140:11
text: An evil speaker won"t be established in the earth. Evil will hunt the violent man to overthrow him.

name: Psalm 140:12
text: I know that Yahweh will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and justice for the needy.

name: Psalm 140:13
text: Surely the righteous will give thanks to your name. The upright will dwell in your presence.

name: Psalm 141:1
text: A Psalm by David. Yahweh, I have called on you. Come to me quickly! Listen to my voice when I call to you.

name: Psalm 141:2
text: Let my prayer be set before you like incense; the lifting up of my hands like the evening sacrifice.

name: Psalm 141:3
text: Set a watch, Yahweh, before my mouth. Keep the door of my lips.

name: Psalm 141:4
text: Don"t incline my heart to any evil thing, to practice deeds of wickedness with men who work iniquity. Don"t let me eat of their delicacies.

name: Psalm 141:5
text: Let the righteous strike me, it is kindness; let him reprove me, it is like oil on the head; don"t let my head refuse it; Yet my prayer is always against evil deeds.

name: Psalm 141:6
text: Their judges are thrown down by the sides of the rock. They will hear my words, for they are well spoken.

name: Psalm 141:7
text: "As when one plows and breaks up the earth, our bones are scattered at the mouth of Sheol."

name: Psalm 141:8
text: For my eyes are on you, Yahweh, the Lord. In you, I take refuge. Don"t leave my soul destitute.

name: Psalm 141:9
text: Keep me from the snare which they have laid for me, from the traps of the workers of iniquity.

name: Psalm 141:10
text: Let the wicked fall together into their own nets, while I pass by.

name: Psalm 142:1
text: A contemplation by David, when he was in the cave. A Prayer. I cry with my voice to Yahweh. With my voice, I ask Yahweh for mercy.

name: Psalm 142:2
text: I pour out my complaint before him. I tell him my troubles.

name: Psalm 142:3
text: When my spirit was overwhelmed within me, you knew my path. In the way in which I walk, they have hidden a snare for me.

name: Psalm 142:4
text: Look on my right, and see; for there is no one who is concerned for me. Refuge has fled from me. No one cares for my soul.

name: Psalm 142:5
text: I cried to you, Yahweh. I said, "You are my refuge, my portion in the land of the living."

name: Psalm 142:6
text: Listen to my cry, for I am in desperate need. deliver me from my persecutors, For they are stronger than me.

name: Psalm 142:7
text: Bring my soul out of prison, that I may give thanks to your name. The righteous will surround me, for you will be good to me.

name: Psalm 143:1
text: A Psalm by David. Hear my prayer, Yahweh. Listen to my petitions. In your faithfulness and righteousness, relieve me.

name: Psalm 143:2
text: Don"t enter into judgment with your servant, for in your sight no man living is righteous.

name: Psalm 143:3
text: For the enemy pursues my soul. He has struck my life down to the ground. He has made me live in dark places, as those who have been long dead.

name: Psalm 143:4
text: Therefore my spirit is overwhelmed within me. My heart within me is desolate.

name: Psalm 143:5
text: I remember the days of old. I meditate on all your doings. I contemplate the work of your hands.

name: Psalm 143:6
text: I spread forth my hands to you. My soul thirsts for you, like a parched land. Selah.

name: Psalm 143:7
text: Hurry to answer me, Yahweh. My spirit fails. Don"t hide your face from me, so that I don"t become like those who go down into the pit.

name: Psalm 143:8
text: Cause me to hear your loving kindness in the morning, for I trust in you. Cause me to know the way in which I should walk, for I lift up my soul to you.

name: Psalm 143:9
text: Deliver me, Yahweh, from my enemies. I flee to you to hide me.

name: Psalm 143:10
text: Teach me to do your will, for you are my God. Your Spirit is good. Lead me in the land of uprightness.

name: Psalm 143:11
text: Revive me, Yahweh, for your name"s sake. In your righteousness, bring my soul out of trouble.

name: Psalm 143:12
text: In your loving kindness, cut off my enemies, and destroy all those who afflict my soul, For I am your servant.

name: Psalm 144:1
text: By David. Blessed be Yahweh, my rock, who teaches my hands to war, and my fingers to battle:

name: Psalm 144:2
text: my loving kindness, my fortress, my high tower, my deliverer, my shield, and he in whom I take refuge; who subdues my people under me.

name: Psalm 144:3
text: Yahweh, what is man, that you care for him? Or the son of man, that you think of him?

name: Psalm 144:4
text: Man is like a breath. His days are like a shadow that passes away.

name: Psalm 144:5
text: Part your heavens, Yahweh, and come down. Touch the mountains, and they will smoke.

name: Psalm 144:6
text: Throw out lightning, and scatter them. Send out your arrows, and rout them.

name: Psalm 144:7
text: Stretch out your hand from above, rescue me, and deliver me out of great waters, out of the hands of foreigners;

name: Psalm 144:8
text: whose mouths speak deceit, Whose right hand is a right hand of falsehood.

name: Psalm 144:9
text: I will sing a new song to you, God. On a ten-stringed lyre, I will sing praises to you.

name: Psalm 144:10
text: You are he who gives salvation to kings, who rescues David, his servant, from the deadly sword.

name: Psalm 144:11
text: Rescue me, and deliver me out of the hands of foreigners, whose mouths speak deceit, whose right hand is a right hand of falsehood.

name: Psalm 144:12
text: Then our sons will be like well-nurtured plants, our daughters like pillars carved to adorn a palace.

name: Psalm 144:13
text: Our barns are full, filled with all kinds of provision. Our sheep bring forth thousands and ten thousands in our fields.

name: Psalm 144:14
text: Our oxen will pull heavy loads. There is no breaking in, and no going away, and no outcry in our streets.

name: Psalm 144:15
text: Happy are the people who are in such a situation. Happy are the people whose God is Yahweh.

name: Psalm 145:1
text: A praise psalm by David. I will exalt you, my God, the King. I will praise your name forever and ever.

name: Psalm 145:2
text: Every day I will praise you. I will extol your name forever and ever.

name: Psalm 145:3
text: Great is Yahweh, and greatly to be praised! His greatness is unsearchable.

name: Psalm 145:4
text: One generation will commend your works to another, and will declare your mighty acts.

name: Psalm 145:5
text: Of the glorious majesty of your honor, of your wondrous works, I will meditate.

name: Psalm 145:6
text: Men will speak of the might of your awesome acts. I will declare your greatness.

name: Psalm 145:7
text: They will utter the memory of your great goodness, and will sing of your righteousness.

name: Psalm 145:8
text: Yahweh is gracious, merciful, slow to anger, and of great loving kindness.

name: Psalm 145:9
text: Yahweh is good to all. His tender mercies are over all his works.

name: Psalm 145:10
text: All your works will give thanks to you, Yahweh. Your saints will extol you.

name: Psalm 145:11
text: They will speak of the glory of your kingdom, and talk about your power;

name: Psalm 145:12
text: to make known to the sons of men his mighty acts, the glory of the majesty of his kingdom.

name: Psalm 145:13
text: Your kingdom is an everlasting kingdom. Your dominion endures throughout all generations. Yahweh is faithful in all his words, and loving in all his deeds.

name: Psalm 145:14
text: Yahweh upholds all who fall, and raises up all those who are bowed down.

name: Psalm 145:15
text: The eyes of all wait for you. You give them their food in due season.

name: Psalm 145:16
text: You open your hand, and satisfy the desire of every living thing.

name: Psalm 145:17
text: Yahweh is righteous in all his ways, and gracious in all his works.

name: Psalm 145:18
text: Yahweh is near to all those who call on him, to all who call on him in truth.

name: Psalm 145:19
text: He will fulfill the desire of those who fear him. He also will hear their cry, and will save them.

name: Psalm 145:20
text: Yahweh preserves all those who love him, but all the wicked he will destroy.

name: Psalm 145:21
text: My mouth will speak the praise of Yahweh. Let all flesh bless his holy name forever and ever.

name: Psalm 146:1
text: Praise Yah! Praise Yahweh, my soul.

name: Psalm 146:2
text: While I live, I will praise Yahweh. I will sing praises to my God as long as I exist.

name: Psalm 146:3
text: Don"t put your trust in princes, each a son of man in whom there is no help.

name: Psalm 146:4
text: His spirit departs, and he returns to the earth. In that very day, his thoughts perish.

name: Psalm 146:5
text: Happy is he who has the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in Yahweh, his God:

name: Psalm 146:6
text: who made heaven and earth, the sea, and all that is in them; who keeps truth forever;

name: Psalm 146:7
text: who executes justice for the oppressed; who gives food to the hungry. Yahweh frees the prisoners.

name: Psalm 146:8
text: Yahweh opens the eyes of the blind. Yahweh raises up those who are bowed down. Yahweh loves the righteous.

name: Psalm 146:9
text: Yahweh preserves the foreigners. He upholds the fatherless and widow, but the way of the wicked he turns upside down.

name: Psalm 146:10
text: Yahweh will reign forever; your God, O Zion, to all generations. Praise Yah!

name: Psalm 147:1
text: Praise Yah, for it is good to sing praises to our God; for it is pleasant and fitting to praise him.

name: Psalm 147:2
text: Yahweh builds up Jerusalem. He gathers together the outcasts of Israel.

name: Psalm 147:3
text: He heals the broken in heart, and binds up their wounds.

name: Psalm 147:4
text: He counts the number of the stars. He calls them all by their names.

name: Psalm 147:5
text: Great is our Lord, and mighty in power. His understanding is infinite.

name: Psalm 147:6
text: Yahweh upholds the humble. He brings the wicked down to the ground.

name: Psalm 147:7
text: Sing to Yahweh with thanksgiving. Sing praises on the harp to our God,

name: Psalm 147:8
text: who covers the sky with clouds, who prepares rain for the earth, who makes grass grow on the mountains.

name: Psalm 147:9
text: He provides food for the livestock, and for the young ravens when they call.

name: Psalm 147:10
text: He doesn"t delight in the strength of the horse. He takes no pleasure in the legs of a man.

name: Psalm 147:11
text: Yahweh takes pleasure in those who fear him, in those who hope in his loving kindness.

name: Psalm 147:12
text: Praise Yahweh, Jerusalem! Praise your God, Zion!

name: Psalm 147:13
text: For he has strengthened the bars of your gates. He has blessed your children within you.

name: Psalm 147:14
text: He makes peace in your borders. He fills you with the finest of the wheat.

name: Psalm 147:15
text: He sends out his commandment to the earth. His word runs very swiftly.

name: Psalm 147:16
text: He gives snow like wool, and scatters frost like ashes.

name: Psalm 147:17
text: He hurls down his hail like pebbles. Who can stand before his cold?

name: Psalm 147:18
text: He sends out his word, and melts them. He causes his wind to blow, and the waters flow.

name: Psalm 147:19
text: He shows his word to Jacob; his statutes and his ordinances to Israel.

name: Psalm 147:20
text: He has not done this for just any nation. They don"t know his ordinances. Praise Yah!

name: Psalm 148:1
text: Praise Yah! Praise Yahweh from the heavens! Praise him in the heights!

name: Psalm 148:2
text: Praise him, all his angels! Praise him, all his army!

name: Psalm 148:3
text: Praise him, sun and moon! Praise him, all you shining stars!

name: Psalm 148:4
text: Praise him, you heavens of heavens, You waters that are above the heavens.

name: Psalm 148:5
text: Let them praise the name of Yahweh, For he commanded, and they were created.

name: Psalm 148:6
text: He has also established them forever and ever. He has made a decree which will not pass away.

name: Psalm 148:7
text: Praise Yahweh from the earth, you great sea creatures, and all depths!

name: Psalm 148:8
text: Lightning and hail, snow and clouds; stormy wind, fulfilling his word;

name: Psalm 148:9
text: mountains and all hills; fruit trees and all cedars;

name: Psalm 148:10
text: wild animals and all livestock; small creatures and flying birds;

name: Psalm 148:11
text: kings of the earth and all peoples; princes and all judges of the earth;

name: Psalm 148:12
text: both young men and maidens; old men and children:

name: Psalm 148:13
text: let them praise the name of Yahweh, for his name alone is exalted. His glory is above the earth and the heavens.

name: Psalm 148:14
text: He has lifted up the horn of his people, the praise of all his saints; even of the children of Israel, a people near to him. Praise Yah!

name: Psalm 149:1
text: Praise Yahweh! Sing to Yahweh a new song, his praise in the assembly of the saints.

name: Psalm 149:2
text: Let Israel rejoice in him who made them. Let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.

name: Psalm 149:3
text: Let them praise his name in the dance! Let them sing praises to him with tambourine and harp!

name: Psalm 149:4
text: For Yahweh takes pleasure in his people. He crowns the humble with salvation.

name: Psalm 149:5
text: Let the saints rejoice in honor. Let them sing for joy on their beds.

name: Psalm 149:6
text: May the high praises of God be in their mouths, and a two-edged sword in their hand;

name: Psalm 149:7
text: To execute vengeance on the nations, and punishments on the peoples;

name: Psalm 149:8
text: To bind their kings with chains, and their nobles with fetters of iron;

name: Psalm 149:9
text: to execute on them the written judgment. All his saints have this honor. Praise Yah!

name: Psalm 150:1
text: Praise Yah! Praise God in his sanctuary! Praise him in his heavens for his acts of power!

name: Psalm 150:2
text: Praise him for his mighty acts! Praise him according to his excellent greatness!

name: Psalm 150:3
text: Praise him with the sounding of the trumpet! Praise him with harp and lyre!

name: Psalm 150:4
text: Praise him with tambourine and dancing! Praise him with stringed instruments and flute!

name: Psalm 150:5
text: Praise him with loud cymbals! Praise him with resounding cymbals!

name: Psalm 150:6
text: Let everything that has breath praise Yah! Praise Yah!

name: Proverbs 1:1
text: The proverbs of Solomon, the son of David, king of Israel:

name: Proverbs 1:2
text: to know wisdom and instruction; to discern the words of understanding;

name: Proverbs 1:3
text: to receive instruction in wise dealing, in righteousness, justice, and equity;

name: Proverbs 1:4
text: to give prudence to the simple, knowledge and discretion to the young man:

name: Proverbs 1:5
text: that the wise man may hear, and increase in learning; that the man of understanding may attain to sound counsel:

name: Proverbs 1:6
text: to understand a proverb, and parables, the words and riddles of the wise.

name: Proverbs 1:7
text: The fear of Yahweh is the beginning of knowledge; but the foolish despise wisdom and instruction.

name: Proverbs 1:8
text: My son, listen to your father"s instruction, and don"t forsake your mother"s teaching:

name: Proverbs 1:9
text: for they will be a garland to grace your head, and chains around your neck.

name: Proverbs 1:10
text: My son, if sinners entice you, don"t consent.

name: Proverbs 1:11
text: If they say, "Come with us, Let"s lay in wait for blood; let"s lurk secretly for the innocent without cause;

name: Proverbs 1:12
text: let"s swallow them up alive like Sheol, and whole, like those who go down into the pit.

name: Proverbs 1:13
text: We"ll find all valuable wealth. We"ll fill our houses with spoil.

name: Proverbs 1:14
text: You shall cast your lot among us. We"ll all have one purse."

name: Proverbs 1:15
text: My son, don"t walk in the way with them. Keep your foot from their path,

name: Proverbs 1:16
text: for their feet run to evil. They hurry to shed blood.

name: Proverbs 1:17
text: For in vain is the net spread in the sight of any bird:

name: Proverbs 1:18
text: but these lay wait for their own blood. They lurk secretly for their own lives.

name: Proverbs 1:19
text: So are the ways of everyone who is greedy for gain. It takes away the life of its owners.

name: Proverbs 1:20
text: Wisdom calls aloud in the street. She utters her voice in the public squares.

name: Proverbs 1:21
text: She calls at the head of noisy places. At the entrance of the city gates, she utters her words:

name: Proverbs 1:22
text: "How long, you simple ones, will you love simplicity? How long will mockers delight themselves in mockery, and fools hate knowledge?

name: Proverbs 1:23
text: Turn at my reproof. Behold, I will pour out my spirit on you. I will make known my words to you.

name: Proverbs 1:24
text: Because I have called, and you have refused; I have stretched out my hand, and no one has paid attention;

name: Proverbs 1:25
text: but you have ignored all my counsel, and wanted none of my reproof;

name: Proverbs 1:26
text: I also will laugh at your disaster. I will mock when calamity overtakes you;

name: Proverbs 1:27
text: when calamity overtakes you like a storm, when your disaster comes on like a whirlwind; when distress and anguish come on you.

name: Proverbs 1:28
text: Then will they call on me, but I will not answer. They will seek me diligently, but they will not find me;

name: Proverbs 1:29
text: because they hated knowledge, and didn"t choose the fear of Yahweh.

name: Proverbs 1:30
text: They wanted none of my counsel. They despised all my reproof.

name: Proverbs 1:31
text: Therefore they will eat of the fruit of their own way, and be filled with their own schemes.

name: Proverbs 1:32
text: For the backsliding of the simple will kill them. The careless ease of fools will destroy them.

name: Proverbs 1:33
text: But whoever listens to me will dwell securely, and will be at ease, without fear of harm."

name: Proverbs 2:1
text: My son, if you will receive my words, and store up my commandments within you;

name: Proverbs 2:2
text: So as to turn your ear to wisdom, and apply your heart to understanding;

name: Proverbs 2:3
text: Yes, if you call out for discernment, and lift up your voice for understanding;

name: Proverbs 2:4
text: If you seek her as silver, and search for her as for hidden treasures:

name: Proverbs 2:5
text: then you will understand the fear of Yahweh, and find the knowledge of God.

name: Proverbs 2:6
text: For Yahweh gives wisdom. Out of his mouth comes knowledge and understanding.

name: Proverbs 2:7
text: He lays up sound wisdom for the upright. He is a shield to those who walk in integrity;

name: Proverbs 2:8
text: that he may guard the paths of justice, and preserve the way of his saints.

name: Proverbs 2:9
text: Then you will understand righteousness and justice, equity and every good path.

name: Proverbs 2:10
text: For wisdom will enter into your heart. Knowledge will be pleasant to your soul.

name: Proverbs 2:11
text: Discretion will watch over you. Understanding will keep you,

name: Proverbs 2:12
text: to deliver you from the way of evil, from the men who speak perverse things;

name: Proverbs 2:13
text: who forsake the paths of uprightness, to walk in the ways of darkness;

name: Proverbs 2:14
text: who rejoice to do evil, and delight in the perverseness of evil;

name: Proverbs 2:15
text: who are crooked in their ways, and wayward in their paths:

name: Proverbs 2:16
text: To deliver you from the strange woman, even from the foreigner who flatters with her words;

name: Proverbs 2:17
text: who forsakes the friend of her youth, and forgets the covenant of her God:

name: Proverbs 2:18
text: for her house leads down to death, her paths to the dead.

name: Proverbs 2:19
text: None who go to her return again, neither do they attain to the paths of life:

name: Proverbs 2:20
text: that you may walk in the way of good men, and keep the paths of the righteous.

name: Proverbs 2:21
text: For the upright will dwell in the land. The perfect will remain in it.

name: Proverbs 2:22
text: But the wicked will be cut off from the land. The treacherous will be rooted out of it.

name: Proverbs 3:1
text: My son, don"t forget my teaching; but let your heart keep my commandments:

name: Proverbs 3:2
text: for length of days, and years of life, and peace, will they add to you.

name: Proverbs 3:3
text: Don"t let kindness and truth forsake you. Bind them around your neck. Write them on the tablet of your heart.

name: Proverbs 3:4
text: So you will find favor, and good understanding in the sight of God and man.

name: Proverbs 3:5
text: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don"t lean on your own understanding.

name: Proverbs 3:6
text: In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

name: Proverbs 3:7
text: Don"t be wise in your own eyes. Fear Yahweh, and depart from evil.

name: Proverbs 3:8
text: It will be health to your body, and nourishment to your bones.

name: Proverbs 3:9
text: Honor Yahweh with your substance, with the first fruits of all your increase:

name: Proverbs 3:10
text: so your barns will be filled with plenty, and your vats will overflow with new wine.

name: Proverbs 3:11
text: My son, don"t despise Yahweh"s discipline, neither be weary of his reproof:

name: Proverbs 3:12
text: for whom Yahweh loves, he reproves; even as a father reproves the son in whom he delights.

name: Proverbs 3:13
text: Happy is the man who finds wisdom, the man who gets understanding.

name: Proverbs 3:14
text: For her good profit is better than getting silver, and her return is better than fine gold.

name: Proverbs 3:15
text: She is more precious than rubies. None of the things you can desire are to be compared to her.

name: Proverbs 3:16
text: Length of days is in her right hand. In her left hand are riches and honor.

name: Proverbs 3:17
text: Her ways are ways of pleasantness. All her paths are peace.

name: Proverbs 3:18
text: She is a tree of life to those who lay hold of her. Happy is everyone who retains her.

name: Proverbs 3:19
text: By wisdom Yahweh founded the earth. By understanding, he established the heavens.

name: Proverbs 3:20
text: By his knowledge, the depths were broken up, and the skies drop down the dew.

name: Proverbs 3:21
text: My son, let them not depart from your eyes. Keep sound wisdom and discretion:

name: Proverbs 3:22
text: so they will be life to your soul, and grace for your neck.

name: Proverbs 3:23
text: Then you shall walk in your way securely. Your foot won"t stumble.

name: Proverbs 3:24
text: When you lie down, you will not be afraid. Yes, you will lie down, and your sleep will be sweet.

name: Proverbs 3:25
text: Don"t be afraid of sudden fear, neither of the desolation of the wicked, when it comes:

name: Proverbs 3:26
text: for Yahweh will be your confidence, and will keep your foot from being taken.

name: Proverbs 3:27
text: Don"t withhold good from those to whom it is due, when it is in the power of your hand to do it.

name: Proverbs 3:28
text: Don"t say to your neighbor, "Go, and come again; tomorrow I will give it to you," when you have it by you.

name: Proverbs 3:29
text: Don"t devise evil against your neighbor, since he dwells securely by you.

name: Proverbs 3:30
text: Don"t strive with a man without cause, if he has done you no harm.

name: Proverbs 3:31
text: Don"t envy the man of violence. Choose none of his ways.

name: Proverbs 3:32
text: For the perverse is an abomination to Yahweh, but his friendship is with the upright.

name: Proverbs 3:33
text: Yahweh"s curse is in the house of the wicked, but he blesses the habitation of the righteous.

name: Proverbs 3:34
text: Surely he mocks the mockers, but he gives grace to the humble.

name: Proverbs 3:35
text: The wise will inherit glory, but shame will be the promotion of fools.

name: Proverbs 4:1
text: Listen, sons, to a father"s instruction. Pay attention and know understanding;

name: Proverbs 4:2
text: for I give you sound learning. Don"t forsake my law.

name: Proverbs 4:3
text: For I was a son to my father, tender and an only child in the sight of my mother.

name: Proverbs 4:4
text: He taught me, and said to me: "Let your heart retain my words. Keep my commandments, and live.

name: Proverbs 4:5
text: Get wisdom. Get understanding. Don"t forget, neither swerve from the words of my mouth.

name: Proverbs 4:6
text: Don"t forsake her, and she will preserve you. Love her, and she will keep you.

name: Proverbs 4:7
text: Wisdom is supreme. Get wisdom. Yes, though it costs all your possessions, get understanding.

name: Proverbs 4:8
text: Esteem her, and she will exalt you. She will bring you to honor, when you embrace her.

name: Proverbs 4:9
text: She will give to your head a garland of grace. She will deliver a crown of splendor to you."

name: Proverbs 4:10
text: Listen, my son, and receive my sayings. The years of your life will be many.

name: Proverbs 4:11
text: I have taught you in the way of wisdom. I have led you in straight paths.

name: Proverbs 4:12
text: When you go, your steps will not be hampered. When you run, you will not stumble.

name: Proverbs 4:13
text: Take firm hold of instruction. Don"t let her go. Keep her, for she is your life.

name: Proverbs 4:14
text: Don"t enter into the path of the wicked. Don"t walk in the way of evil men.

name: Proverbs 4:15
text: Avoid it, and don"t pass by it. Turn from it, and pass on.

name: Proverbs 4:16
text: For they don"t sleep, unless they do evil. Their sleep is taken away, unless they make someone fall.

name: Proverbs 4:17
text: For they eat the bread of wickedness, and drink the wine of violence.

name: Proverbs 4:18
text: But the path of the righteous is like the dawning light, that shines more and more until the perfect day.

name: Proverbs 4:19
text: The way of the wicked is like darkness. They don"t know what they stumble over.

name: Proverbs 4:20
text: My son, attend to my words. Turn your ear to my sayings.

name: Proverbs 4:21
text: Let them not depart from your eyes. Keep them in the midst of your heart.

name: Proverbs 4:22
text: For they are life to those who find them, and health to their whole body.

name: Proverbs 4:23
text: Keep your heart with all diligence, for out of it is the wellspring of life.

name: Proverbs 4:24
text: Put away from yourself a perverse mouth. Put corrupt lips far from you.

name: Proverbs 4:25
text: Let your eyes look straight ahead. Fix your gaze directly before you.

name: Proverbs 4:26
text: Make the path of your feet level. Let all of your ways be established.

name: Proverbs 4:27
text: Don"t turn to the right hand nor to the left. Remove your foot from evil.

name: Proverbs 5:1
text: My son, pay attention to my wisdom. Turn your ear to my understanding:

name: Proverbs 5:2
text: that you may maintain discretion, that your lips may preserve knowledge.

name: Proverbs 5:3
text: For the lips of an adulteress drip honey. Her mouth is smoother than oil,

name: Proverbs 5:4
text: But in the end she is as bitter as wormwood, and as sharp as a two-edged sword.

name: Proverbs 5:5
text: Her feet go down to death. Her steps lead straight to Sheol.

name: Proverbs 5:6
text: She gives no thought to the way of life. Her ways are crooked, and she doesn"t know it.

name: Proverbs 5:7
text: Now therefore, my sons, listen to me. Don"t depart from the words of my mouth.

name: Proverbs 5:8
text: Remove your way far from her. Don"t come near the door of her house,

name: Proverbs 5:9
text: lest you give your honor to others, and your years to the cruel one;

name: Proverbs 5:10
text: lest strangers feast on your wealth, and your labors enrich another man"s house.

name: Proverbs 5:11
text: You will groan at your latter end, when your flesh and your body are consumed,

name: Proverbs 5:12
text: and say, "How I have hated instruction, and my heart despised reproof;

name: Proverbs 5:13
text: neither have I obeyed the voice of my teachers, nor turned my ear to those who instructed me!

name: Proverbs 5:14
text: I have come to the brink of utter ruin, in the midst of the gathered assembly."

name: Proverbs 5:15
text: Drink water out of your own cistern, running water out of your own well.

name: Proverbs 5:16
text: Should your springs overflow in the streets, streams of water in the public squares?

name: Proverbs 5:17
text: Let them be for yourself alone, not for strangers with you.

name: Proverbs 5:18
text: Let your spring be blessed. Rejoice in the wife of your youth.

name: Proverbs 5:19
text: A loving doe and a graceful deer"let her breasts satisfy you at all times. Be captivated always with her love.

name: Proverbs 5:20
text: For why should you, my son, be captivated with an adulteress? Why embrace the bosom of another?

name: Proverbs 5:21
text: For the ways of man are before the eyes of Yahweh. He examines all his paths.

name: Proverbs 5:22
text: The evil deeds of the wicked ensnare him. The cords of his sin hold him firmly.

name: Proverbs 5:23
text: He will die for lack of instruction. In the greatness of his folly, he will go astray.

name: Proverbs 6:1
text: My son, if you have become collateral for your neighbor, if you have struck your hands in pledge for a stranger;

name: Proverbs 6:2
text: You are trapped by the words of your mouth. You are ensnared with the words of your mouth.

name: Proverbs 6:3
text: Do this now, my son, and deliver yourself, since you have come into the hand of your neighbor. Go, humble yourself. Press your plea with your neighbor.

name: Proverbs 6:4
text: Give no sleep to your eyes, nor slumber to your eyelids.

name: Proverbs 6:5
text: Free yourself, like a gazelle from the hand of the hunter, like a bird from the snare of the fowler.

name: Proverbs 6:6
text: Go to the ant, you sluggard. Consider her ways, and be wise;

name: Proverbs 6:7
text: which having no chief, overseer, or ruler,

name: Proverbs 6:8
text: provides her bread in the summer, and gathers her food in the harvest.

name: Proverbs 6:9
text: How long will you sleep, sluggard? When will you arise out of your sleep?

name: Proverbs 6:10
text: A little sleep, a little slumber, a little folding of the hands to sleep:

name: Proverbs 6:11
text: so your poverty will come as a robber, and your scarcity as an armed man.

name: Proverbs 6:12
text: A worthless person, a man of iniquity, is he who walks with a perverse mouth;

name: Proverbs 6:13
text: who winks with his eyes, who signals with his feet, who motions with his fingers;

name: Proverbs 6:14
text: in whose heart is perverseness, who devises evil continually, who always sows discord.

name: Proverbs 6:15
text: Therefore his calamity will come suddenly. He will be broken suddenly, and that without remedy.

name: Proverbs 6:16
text: There are six things which Yahweh hates; yes, seven which are an abomination to him:

name: Proverbs 6:17
text: haughty eyes, a lying tongue, hands that shed innocent blood;

name: Proverbs 6:18
text: a heart that devises wicked schemes, feet that are swift in running to mischief,

name: Proverbs 6:19
text: a false witness who utters lies, and he who sows discord among brothers.

name: Proverbs 6:20
text: My son, keep your father"s commandment, and don"t forsake your mother"s teaching.

name: Proverbs 6:21
text: Bind them continually on your heart. Tie them around your neck.

name: Proverbs 6:22
text: When you walk, it will lead you. When you sleep, it will watch over you. When you awake, it will talk with you.

name: Proverbs 6:23
text: For the commandment is a lamp, and the law is light. Reproofs of instruction are the way of life,

name: Proverbs 6:24
text: to keep you from the immoral woman, from the flattery of the wayward wife"s tongue.

name: Proverbs 6:25
text: Don"t lust after her beauty in your heart, neither let her captivate you with her eyelids.

name: Proverbs 6:26
text: For a prostitute reduces you to a piece of bread. The adulteress hunts for your precious life.

name: Proverbs 6:27
text: Can a man scoop fire into his lap, and his clothes not be burned?

name: Proverbs 6:28
text: Or can one walk on hot coals, and his feet not be scorched?

name: Proverbs 6:29
text: So is he who goes in to his neighbor"s wife. Whoever touches her will not be unpunished.

name: Proverbs 6:30
text: Men don"t despise a thief, if he steals to satisfy himself when he is hungry:

name: Proverbs 6:31
text: but if he is found, he shall restore seven times. He shall give all the wealth of his house.

name: Proverbs 6:32
text: He who commits adultery with a woman is void of understanding. He who does it destroys his own soul.

name: Proverbs 6:33
text: He will get wounds and dishonor. His reproach will not be wiped away.

name: Proverbs 6:34
text: For jealousy arouses the fury of the husband. He won"t spare in the day of vengeance.

name: Proverbs 6:35
text: He won"t regard any ransom, neither will he rest content, though you give many gifts.

name: Proverbs 7:1
text: My son, keep my words. Lay up my commandments within you.

name: Proverbs 7:2
text: Keep my commandments and live! Guard my teaching as the apple of your eye.

name: Proverbs 7:3
text: Bind them on your fingers. Write them on the tablet of your heart.

name: Proverbs 7:4
text: Tell wisdom, "You are my sister." Call understanding your relative,

name: Proverbs 7:5
text: that they may keep you from the strange woman, from the foreigner who flatters with her words.

name: Proverbs 7:6
text: For at the window of my house, I looked out through my lattice.

name: Proverbs 7:7
text: I saw among the simple ones. I discerned among the youths a young man void of understanding,

name: Proverbs 7:8
text: passing through the street near her corner, he went the way to her house,

name: Proverbs 7:9
text: in the twilight, in the evening of the day, in the middle of the night and in the darkness.

name: Proverbs 7:10
text: Behold, there a woman met him with the attire of a prostitute, and with crafty intent.

name: Proverbs 7:11
text: She is loud and defiant. Her feet don"t stay in her house.

name: Proverbs 7:12
text: Now she is in the streets, now in the squares, and lurking at every corner.

name: Proverbs 7:13
text: So she caught him, and kissed him. With an impudent face she said to him:

name: Proverbs 7:14
text: "Sacrifices of peace offerings are with me. This day I have paid my vows.

name: Proverbs 7:15
text: Therefore I came out to meet you, to diligently seek your face, and I have found you.

name: Proverbs 7:16
text: I have spread my couch with carpets of tapestry, with striped cloths of the yarn of Egypt.

name: Proverbs 7:17
text: I have perfumed my bed with myrrh, aloes, and cinnamon.

name: Proverbs 7:18
text: Come, let"s take our fill of loving until the morning. Let"s solace ourselves with loving.

name: Proverbs 7:19
text: For my husband isn"t at home. He has gone on a long journey.

name: Proverbs 7:20
text: He has taken a bag of money with him. He will come home at the full moon."

name: Proverbs 7:21
text: With persuasive words, she led him astray. With the flattering of her lips, she seduced him.

name: Proverbs 7:22
text: He followed her immediately, as an ox goes to the slaughter, as a fool stepping into a noose.

name: Proverbs 7:23
text: Until an arrow strikes through his liver, as a bird hurries to the snare, and doesn"t know that it will cost his life.

name: Proverbs 7:24
text: Now therefore, sons, listen to me. Pay attention to the words of my mouth.

name: Proverbs 7:25
text: Don"t let your heart turn to her ways. Don"t go astray in her paths,

name: Proverbs 7:26
text: for she has thrown down many wounded. Yes, all her slain are a mighty army.

name: Proverbs 7:27
text: Her house is the way to Sheol, going down to the rooms of death.

name: Proverbs 8:1
text: Doesn"t wisdom cry out? Doesn"t understanding raise her voice?

name: Proverbs 8:2
text: On the top of high places by the way, where the paths meet, she stands.

name: Proverbs 8:3
text: Beside the gates, at the entry of the city, at the entry doors, she cries aloud:

name: Proverbs 8:4
text: "To you men, I call! I send my voice to the sons of mankind.

name: Proverbs 8:5
text: You simple, understand prudence. You fools, be of an understanding heart.

name: Proverbs 8:6
text: Hear, for I will speak excellent things. The opening of my lips is for right things.

name: Proverbs 8:7
text: For my mouth speaks truth. Wickedness is an abomination to my lips.

name: Proverbs 8:8
text: All the words of my mouth are in righteousness. There is nothing crooked or perverse in them.

name: Proverbs 8:9
text: They are all plain to him who understands, right to those who find knowledge.

name: Proverbs 8:10
text: Receive my instruction rather than silver; knowledge rather than choice gold.

name: Proverbs 8:11
text: For wisdom is better than rubies. All the things that may be desired can"t be compared to it.

name: Proverbs 8:12
text: "I, wisdom, have made prudence my dwelling. Find out knowledge and discretion.

name: Proverbs 8:13
text: The fear of Yahweh is to hate evil. I hate pride, arrogance, the evil way, and the perverse mouth.

name: Proverbs 8:14
text: Counsel and sound knowledge are mine. I have understanding and power.

name: Proverbs 8:15
text: By me kings reign, and princes decree justice.

name: Proverbs 8:16
text: By me princes rule; nobles, and all the righteous rulers of the earth.

name: Proverbs 8:17
text: I love those who love me. Those who seek me diligently will find me.

name: Proverbs 8:18
text: With me are riches, honor, enduring wealth, and prosperity.

name: Proverbs 8:19
text: My fruit is better than gold, yes, than fine gold; my yield than choice silver.

name: Proverbs 8:20
text: I walk in the way of righteousness, in the midst of the paths of justice;

name: Proverbs 8:21
text: That I may give wealth to those who love me. I fill their treasuries.

name: Proverbs 8:22
text: "Yahweh possessed me in the beginning of his work, before his deeds of old.

name: Proverbs 8:23
text: I was set up from everlasting, from the beginning, before the earth existed.

name: Proverbs 8:24
text: When there were no depths, I was brought forth, when there were no springs abounding with water.

name: Proverbs 8:25
text: Before the mountains were settled in place, before the hills, I was brought forth;

name: Proverbs 8:26
text: while as yet he had not made the earth, nor the fields, nor the beginning of the dust of the world.

name: Proverbs 8:27
text: When he established the heavens, I was there; when he set a circle on the surface of the deep,

name: Proverbs 8:28
text: when he established the clouds above, when the springs of the deep became strong,

name: Proverbs 8:29
text: when he gave to the sea its boundary, that the waters should not violate his commandment, when he marked out the foundations of the earth;

name: Proverbs 8:30
text: then I was the craftsman by his side. I was a delight day by day, always rejoicing before him,

name: Proverbs 8:31
text: Rejoicing in his whole world. My delight was with the sons of men.

name: Proverbs 8:32
text: "Now therefore, my sons, listen to me, for blessed are those who keep my ways.

name: Proverbs 8:33
text: Hear instruction, and be wise. Don"t refuse it.

name: Proverbs 8:34
text: Blessed is the man who hears me, watching daily at my gates, waiting at my door posts.

name: Proverbs 8:35
text: For whoever finds me, finds life, and will obtain favor from Yahweh.

name: Proverbs 8:36
text: But he who sins against me wrongs his own soul. All those who hate me love death."

name: Proverbs 9:1
text: Wisdom has built her house. She has carved out her seven pillars.

name: Proverbs 9:2
text: She has prepared her meat. She has mixed her wine. She has also set her table.

name: Proverbs 9:3
text: She has sent out her maidens. She cries from the highest places of the city:

name: Proverbs 9:4
text: "Whoever is simple, let him turn in here!" As for him who is void of understanding, she says to him,

name: Proverbs 9:5
text: "Come, eat some of my bread, Drink some of the wine which I have mixed!

name: Proverbs 9:6
text: Leave your simple ways, and live. Walk in the way of understanding."

name: Proverbs 9:7
text: He who corrects a mocker invites insult. He who reproves a wicked man invites abuse.

name: Proverbs 9:8
text: Don"t reprove a scoffer, lest he hate you. Reprove a wise man, and he will love you.

name: Proverbs 9:9
text: Instruct a wise man, and he will be still wiser. Teach a righteous man, and he will increase in learning.

name: Proverbs 9:10
text: The fear of Yahweh is the beginning of wisdom. The knowledge of the Holy One is understanding.

name: Proverbs 9:11
text: For by me your days will be multiplied. The years of your life will be increased.

name: Proverbs 9:12
text: If you are wise, you are wise for yourself. If you mock, you alone will bear it.

name: Proverbs 9:13
text: The foolish woman is loud, Undisciplined, and knows nothing.

name: Proverbs 9:14
text: She sits at the door of her house, on a seat in the high places of the city,

name: Proverbs 9:15
text: To call to those who pass by, who go straight on their ways,

name: Proverbs 9:16
text: "Whoever is simple, let him turn in here." as for him who is void of understanding, she says to him,

name: Proverbs 9:17
text: "Stolen water is sweet. Food eaten in secret is pleasant."

name: Proverbs 9:18
text: But he doesn"t know that the dead are there, that her guests are in the depths of Sheol.

name: Proverbs 10:1
text: The proverbs of Solomon. A wise son makes a glad father; but a foolish son brings grief to his mother.

name: Proverbs 10:2
text: Treasures of wickedness profit nothing, but righteousness delivers from death.

name: Proverbs 10:3
text: Yahweh will not allow the soul of the righteous to go hungry, but he thrusts away the desire of the wicked.

name: Proverbs 10:4
text: He becomes poor who works with a lazy hand, but the hand of the diligent brings wealth.

name: Proverbs 10:5
text: He who gathers in summer is a wise son, but he who sleeps during the harvest is a son who causes shame.

name: Proverbs 10:6
text: Blessings are on the head of the righteous, but violence covers the mouth of the wicked.

name: Proverbs 10:7
text: The memory of the righteous is blessed, but the name of the wicked will rot.

name: Proverbs 10:8
text: The wise in heart accept commandments, but a chattering fool will fall.

name: Proverbs 10:9
text: He who walks blamelessly walks surely, but he who perverts his ways will be found out.

name: Proverbs 10:10
text: One winking with the eye causes sorrow, but a chattering fool will fall.

name: Proverbs 10:11
text: The mouth of the righteous is a spring of life, but violence covers the mouth of the wicked.

name: Proverbs 10:12
text: Hatred stirs up strife, but love covers all wrongs.

name: Proverbs 10:13
text: Wisdom is found on the lips of him who has discernment, but a rod is for the back of him who is void of understanding.

name: Proverbs 10:14
text: Wise men lay up knowledge, but the mouth of the foolish is near ruin.

name: Proverbs 10:15
text: The rich man"s wealth is his strong city. The destruction of the poor is their poverty.

name: Proverbs 10:16
text: The labor of the righteous leads to life. The increase of the wicked leads to sin.

name: Proverbs 10:17
text: He is in the way of life who heeds correction, but he who forsakes reproof leads others astray.

name: Proverbs 10:18
text: He who hides hatred has lying lips. He who utters a slander is a fool.

name: Proverbs 10:19
text: In the multitude of words there is no lack of disobedience, but he who restrains his lips does wisely.

name: Proverbs 10:20
text: The tongue of the righteous is like choice silver. The heart of the wicked is of little worth.

name: Proverbs 10:21
text: The lips of the righteous feed many, but the foolish die for lack of understanding.

name: Proverbs 10:22
text: Yahweh"s blessing brings wealth, and he adds no trouble to it.

name: Proverbs 10:23
text: It is a fool"s pleasure to do wickedness, but wisdom is a man of understanding"s pleasure.

name: Proverbs 10:24
text: What the wicked fear, will overtake them, but the desire of the righteous will be granted.

name: Proverbs 10:25
text: When the whirlwind passes, the wicked is no more; but the righteous stand firm forever.

name: Proverbs 10:26
text: As vinegar to the teeth, and as smoke to the eyes, so is the sluggard to those who send him.

name: Proverbs 10:27
text: The fear of Yahweh prolongs days, but the years of the wicked shall be shortened.

name: Proverbs 10:28
text: The prospect of the righteous is joy, but the hope of the wicked will perish.

name: Proverbs 10:29
text: The way of Yahweh is a stronghold to the upright, but it is a destruction to the workers of iniquity.

name: Proverbs 10:30
text: The righteous will never be removed, but the wicked will not dwell in the land.

name: Proverbs 10:31
text: The mouth of the righteous brings forth wisdom, but the perverse tongue will be cut off.

name: Proverbs 10:32
text: The lips of the righteous know what is acceptable, but the mouth of the wicked is perverse.

name: Proverbs 11:1
text: A false balance is an abomination to Yahweh, but accurate weights are his delight.

name: Proverbs 11:2
text: When pride comes, then comes shame, but with humility comes wisdom.

name: Proverbs 11:3
text: The integrity of the upright shall guide them, but the perverseness of the treacherous shall destroy them.

name: Proverbs 11:4
text: Riches don"t profit in the day of wrath, but righteousness delivers from death.

name: Proverbs 11:5
text: The righteousness of the blameless will direct his way, but the wicked shall fall by his own wickedness.

name: Proverbs 11:6
text: The righteousness of the upright shall deliver them, but the unfaithful will be trapped by evil desires.

name: Proverbs 11:7
text: When a wicked man dies, hope perishes, and expectation of power comes to nothing.

name: Proverbs 11:8
text: A righteous person is delivered out of trouble, and the wicked takes his place.

name: Proverbs 11:9
text: With his mouth the godless man destroys his neighbor, but the righteous will be delivered through knowledge.

name: Proverbs 11:10
text: When it goes well with the righteous, the city rejoices. When the wicked perish, there is shouting.

name: Proverbs 11:11
text: By the blessing of the upright, the city is exalted, but it is overthrown by the mouth of the wicked.

name: Proverbs 11:12
text: One who despises his neighbor is void of wisdom, but a man of understanding holds his peace.

name: Proverbs 11:13
text: One who brings gossip betrays a confidence, but one who is of a trustworthy spirit is one who keeps a secret.

name: Proverbs 11:14
text: Where there is no wise guidance, the nation falls, but in the multitude of counselors there is victory.

name: Proverbs 11:15
text: He who is collateral for a stranger will suffer for it, but he who refuses pledges of collateral is secure.

name: Proverbs 11:16
text: A gracious woman obtains honor, but violent men obtain riches.

name: Proverbs 11:17
text: The merciful man does good to his own soul, but he who is cruel troubles his own flesh.

name: Proverbs 11:18
text: Wicked people earn deceitful wages, but one who sows righteousness reaps a sure reward.

name: Proverbs 11:19
text: He who is truly righteous gets life. He who pursues evil gets death.

name: Proverbs 11:20
text: Those who are perverse in heart are an abomination to Yahweh, but those whose ways are blameless are his delight.

name: Proverbs 11:21
text: Most certainly, the evil man will not be unpunished, but the seed of the righteous will be delivered.

name: Proverbs 11:22
text: Like a gold ring in a pig"s snout, is a beautiful woman who lacks discretion.

name: Proverbs 11:23
text: The desire of the righteous is only good. The expectation of the wicked is wrath.

name: Proverbs 11:24
text: There is one who scatters, and increases yet more. There is one who withholds more than is appropriate, but gains poverty.

name: Proverbs 11:25
text: The liberal soul shall be made fat. He who waters shall be watered also himself.

name: Proverbs 11:26
text: People curse someone who withholds grain, but blessing will be on the head of him who sells it.

name: Proverbs 11:27
text: He who diligently seeks good seeks favor, but he who searches after evil, it shall come to him.

name: Proverbs 11:28
text: He who trusts in his riches will fall, but the righteous shall flourish as the green leaf.

name: Proverbs 11:29
text: He who troubles his own house shall inherit the wind. The foolish shall be servant to the wise of heart.

name: Proverbs 11:30
text: The fruit of the righteous is a tree of life. He who is wise wins souls.

name: Proverbs 11:31
text: Behold, the righteous shall be repaid in the earth; how much more the wicked and the sinner!

name: Proverbs 12:1
text: Whoever loves correction loves knowledge, but he who hates reproof is stupid.

name: Proverbs 12:2
text: A good man shall obtain favor from Yahweh, but he will condemn a man of wicked devices.

name: Proverbs 12:3
text: A man shall not be established by wickedness, but the root of the righteous shall not be moved.

name: Proverbs 12:4
text: A worthy woman is the crown of her husband, but a disgraceful wife is as rottenness in his bones.

name: Proverbs 12:5
text: The thoughts of the righteous are just, but the advice of the wicked is deceitful.

name: Proverbs 12:6
text: The words of the wicked are about lying in wait for blood, but the speech of the upright rescues them.

name: Proverbs 12:7
text: The wicked are overthrown, and are no more, but the house of the righteous shall stand.

name: Proverbs 12:8
text: A man shall be commended according to his wisdom, but he who has a warped mind shall be despised.

name: Proverbs 12:9
text: Better is he who is lightly esteemed, and has a servant, than he who honors himself, and lacks bread.

name: Proverbs 12:10
text: A righteous man respects the life of his animal, but the tender mercies of the wicked are cruel.

name: Proverbs 12:11
text: He who tills his land shall have plenty of bread, but he who chases fantasies is void of understanding.

name: Proverbs 12:12
text: The wicked desires the plunder of evil men, but the root of the righteous flourishes.

name: Proverbs 12:13
text: An evil man is trapped by sinfulness of lips, but the righteous shall come out of trouble.

name: Proverbs 12:14
text: A man shall be satisfied with good by the fruit of his mouth. The work of a man"s hands shall be rewarded to him.

name: Proverbs 12:15
text: The way of a fool is right in his own eyes, but he who is wise listens to counsel.

name: Proverbs 12:16
text: A fool shows his annoyance the same day, but one who overlooks an insult is prudent.

name: Proverbs 12:17
text: He who is truthful testifies honestly, but a false witness lies.

name: Proverbs 12:18
text: There is one who speaks rashly like the piercing of a sword, but the tongue of the wise heals.

name: Proverbs 12:19
text: Truth"s lips will be established forever, but a lying tongue is only momentary.

name: Proverbs 12:20
text: Deceit is in the heart of those who plot evil, but joy comes to the promoters of peace.

name: Proverbs 12:21
text: No mischief shall happen to the righteous, but the wicked shall be filled with evil.

name: Proverbs 12:22
text: Lying lips are an abomination to Yahweh, but those who do the truth are his delight.

name: Proverbs 12:23
text: A prudent man keeps his knowledge, but the hearts of fools proclaim foolishness.

name: Proverbs 12:24
text: The hands of the diligent ones shall rule, but laziness ends in slave labor.

name: Proverbs 12:25
text: Anxiety in a man"s heart weighs it down, but a kind word makes it glad.

name: Proverbs 12:26
